name: Create Jam Fall 2017 Launcher
description:
Game launcher made at Create Jam Fall 2017, for all the submissions. Contains all games - if you download this, there's no need to download any of the other submissions, as they are all available.

Currently only works on windows. It's a hackjob that only works due to sheer luck and loads of coffee - please let me know if you find any bugs or mistakes. I do want to update it some time in the future, but it might take a while.

The games are all featured in the state they were in when the Jam closed.

Made with Löve2D.

 - Thor
